name: upload-bom-dtrack-task
description: Upload a BOM file to Dependency Track platform.
author: Edouard Shaar

inputs.name: bomFilePath
inputs.label: BOM File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path where the BOM file is located. (e.g. 'directory/**/bom.xml').

inputs.name: dtrackProjId
inputs.label: Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The guid of the project in Dependency Track

inputs.name: dtrackURI
inputs.label: Dependency Track URI

messages.FileNotFound: BOM file path is not a file: %s
